text: my image of freedom is this photograph
of President Truman in the Jefferson
Memorial looking up at this incredible
statue of Thomas Jefferson surrounded by
all these great quotes from his ideas
you notice up at the top of my favorite
quote of all where he swears his eternal
hostility to any form of tyranny over
the mind of man
for me this quote really defines the
essence of freedom and still has
incredible relevance today
we have been moving in the direction of
a much more stronger state of
surveillance of ordinary people we may
not fear that the current US government
will become a police state but we've
allowed them to build all the machinery
than they need the East German Stasi
would envy this level of access to
everybody's thoughts and that quote that
sentiment is one that's really
fundamental and bedrock to my thinking
and to my work
